main event: A light observed in the sky was reported by a witness in Oakland, California on 7/6/1967.
interesting points: The object was described as having the same brightness as the brightest star and remained stationary for 15 minutes before disappearing., The witness estimated the distance to the object to be 3 to 5 miles away., The object was red in color and shaped like a jet fighter., The witness observed the object move rapidly away in a straight line., The sighting lasted for several minutes and was reported without any physical evidence.
